channel.title: Tenement on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Tenement on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Cambodia Submits Horror Thriller ‘Tenement’ as Oscar Entry
item.description: Cambodia has submitted the psychological horror thriller “Tenement,” co-directed by Inrasothythep Neth and Sokyou Chea, as its contender for best international feature at the 98th Academy

item.title: Cambodia Submits Horror Thriller ‘Tenement’ as Oscar Entry
item.description: Cambodia has submitted the psychological horror thriller “Tenement,” co-directed by Inrasothythep Neth and Sokyou Chea, as its contender for best international feature at the 98th Academy
